svg.text: Manage Friends Use Case
Use Case Specification
Use Case Name:
Manage Friends
Actor(s):
Regular User
Description:
Comprehensive social management system with four-tab interface for managing
friends, friend requests, sent requests, and blocked users with full interaction capabilities.
Preconditions:
1. User must be logged in with active account
Main Flow:
1. User navigates to Friends page from sidebar navigation
2. System displays four-tab interface: Friends, Requests, Sent, Blocked
3. Friends tab shows current friends list with profile pictures and names
4. Each friend entry provides: View Profile, Remove Friend, Block options
5. Requests tab displays incoming friend requests with Accept/Decline buttons
6. Sent tab shows outgoing requests with Cancel Request option
7. Blocked tab lists blocked users with Unblock functionality
8. User can search for new friends using search functionality
9. System provides "Add Friend" button for discovered users
10. Friend requests generate notifications to recipients
11. System updates friend counts and status in real-time
12. All social interactions are logged for activity tracking
13. System maintains privacy settings for friend visibility
14. Friends can view each other's public profile information
Alternative Flows:
A1. Accept request: User accepts friend request, both users become friends
A2. Decline request: User declines request, sender receives notification
A3. Block user: User blocks another user, preventing all future interactions
A4. Remove friend: User removes friend, both users lose friend connection
A5. Cancel sent request: User cancels outgoing friend request
A6. Unblock user: User unblocks previously blocked user, restoring interaction
